ctu_text: ", "detailedDescription": [{"type": "align_justify", "children": [{"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "The scheme \u201cSwasraya Scheme for Parents/Mothers of Physically Handicapped/Mentally Retarded Persons\u201d was launched by the Department of Social Justice, Government of Kerala. Under the scheme, financial assistance is provided to women of Below Poverty Line (BPL) families to find self-employment, whose husbands have died/abandoned, and who have to take care of their sons/children with severe physical and mental challenges. "}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "Parents of severely mentally retarded and differently-abled persons require emotional strength and flexibility. Older parents can find themselves overwhelmed by various medical, caregiving, and financial responsibilities.
